attributes.action: reunite the United Kingdom by repealing all acts of devolution and making Westminster the only seat of government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By establishing separate legislatures and executives in 3 of the 4 Home Nations we have created disunity and betrayed the spirit of the UK. 

Devolved government serves no real purpose. We were told that it was so that each of the 3 Nations could deal with their own issues. However before devolution there weren't any issues exclusive to Wales, Scotland or Northern Ireland. 

It was and still is possible for a united British people to deal with all issues together - after all isn't that the spirit behind unity?
